altTitles.th: ทำนองรักจากใจให้เธอ

altTitles.ja: あなたへのクレッシェンド

description.en:
From *Intercross*:  
  
1-3) *Anata e no Crescendo*  
First love. Reunion. Misunderstanding. Passing by each other. And…a teary happy ending.  
**"When you can play this tune, play it for me"**…Suzuno has always been searching for the boy who told her that, whom she met at a piano recital when she was small. After entering high school, she was chosen to play the piano to accompany a chorus competition. Suzuno started practicing with Aiba-kun and Fujisawa-kun from her class, but Fujisawa-kun told her that they used to meet when they were small…!?  
  
4) *Invincible Love Mission*  
Ten years ago Hina, without a single relative, was taken into the Ichijou family as the bodyguard for their eldest son, Reo. *However…*  
  
5) *God's Love Theorem*  
**"Please let me have a boyfriend this year"** Mizutani Yuzu, 16 years old, has up until now, never visited the shrine on New Years but she has a wish to be granted no matter what. When She throws her money offering hers gets hit by another and doesnt go in. *Will her wish come true?*  
  
6) *Mistake!*  
**"My friend Ryou, who always fights with me, confessed to me yesterday. It was so sudden…that without thinking…RAN AWAY"'** The place that exploded is the residence of Professor Random, a curio inventor! There's no damage to the neighborhood, but it seems that the mysterious smoke that he developed was spread thoughout the town. This smoke is harmless, however it changes humans into…!
